messages.subject: computer programming for kids
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I lurk on this list because isn t easy for me to express myself in english but you help me a lot frecuently. A homeschooling dad from Spain is asking
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
I lurk on this list because isn't easy for me to express myself in english but you help me a lot frecuently.
A homeschooling dad from Spain is asking help. His 6 y/o son likes computer a lot. He wants to teach the kid pc programming and is looking for something simple.

I invite Spanish language unschoolers to this list: http://groups.msn.com/aprendizajenatural/

Thanks in advance for your support.
Betty Polanco, a radical unschooler mom for Emmanuel 12, Hector Luis 9 and Hector Ivan 6, from Puerto Rico

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
